bibl.title: A New Fragment of LXX Isaiah 23 (Rahlfs-Fraenkel 844). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Princ. Inv. Garrett Deposit 1924, H.I. Bell, No. II 2G forms part of the same page as P. Wash. Libr. of Congr. Inv. 4082 B (= van Haelst 295; LDAB 3122). Third or fourth century. Edition of the two papyri combined.

bibl.idno: P. Princ. Inv. Garrett Deposit 1924, H.I. Bell, No. II 2G + P. Wash. Libr. of Congr. Inv. 4082 B

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Princ. Inv. Garrett Deposit 1924, H.I. Bell, No. II 2G + P. Wash. Libr. of Congr. Inv. 4082 B
LUIJENDIJK AnneMarie, A New Fragment of LXX Isaiah 23 (Rahlfs-Fraenkel 844). Avec résumé en anglais.

P. Princ. Inv. Garrett Deposit 1924, H.I. Bell, No. II 2G forms part of the same page as P. Wash. Libr. of Congr. Inv. 4082 B (= van Haelst 295; LDAB 3122). Third or fourth century. Edition of the two papyri combined.
